content: Skandha of Choice is one of the Key Items found late in Black Myth: Wukong. While you can't use it initially, once you reach Chapter 6, you can unlock a big stat boost for the rest of your run and your New Game Plus through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Choice.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Choice'.
The content is as follows:
Skandha of Choice is one of the Key Items found late in Black Myth: Wukong. While you can't use it initially, once you reach Chapter 6, you can unlock a big stat boost for the rest of your run and your New Game Plus through.
